name: Hank
description: Hank is a one-shrimp, one-tank army on a mission to liberate sea life from kitchens and markets everywhere. Chefs, consider yourselves on notice!

gadgets.name: Waterballoons
gadgets.description: The next Balloon Blast also slows down enemies for 3 seconds.

gadgets.name: Barricade
gadgets.description: Hank takes 40% reduced damage for 3 seconds.

starpowers.name: It's Gonna Blow
starpowers.description: When Balloon Blast is charged over 80%, Hank gains 10% extra movement speed.

starpowers.name: Take Cover!
starpowers.description: Hank takes 20% less damage when near a wall.

tips: If Hank is positioned correctly or is at point-blank range of the safe in Heist, he can deal devastatingly high damage to it with his Super.

You can use his It's Gonna Blow Star Power to get close to opponents, shoot your attack, and move in to shoot your Super at close range to do devastating damage to your opponent after weakening them with your attack.
It's better to wait for Hank's attack to charge almost or totally full before shooting, even if it means a little damage in the meantime, the payoff of huge damage is worth it.
You can use his Super to detour dangerous enemies by quickfiring, as they will get semi-distracted with it and give you time to heal or regroup.
His attack pierces enemies, and is very good for breaking up crowds of enemies that are close together or clumps of Power Cube boxes.
You can use his Waterballoons Gadget to slow enemies and do devastating damage at short-range, or slow assassins like Edgar or Sam to keep them at a safe distance.
His Barricade Gadget can be used to give himself a defense mechanism when walking the ball into the goal in Brawl Ball, or getting close to enemies to unleash his powerful attack.

When approaching an enemy, aim his bubble in the opposite direction of that enemy. When the bubble is at its maximum size, rotate the attack joystick to aim towards the enemy, and release quickly. This strategy catches the enemy off-guard as they will not be able to gauge a safe distance from you while your bubble is not facing them.

attack.name: Balloon Blast
attack.description: The longer you hold, the deadlier the blast.

super.name: Fish Torpedo
super.description: Hank launches Fish Torpedoes in all directions.
